name: ft_printf
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-libft. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-02, 42cursus-push_swap, fract-ol, pipex, minitalk, and 42cursus-fdf
description:
This project is pretty straight forward. You will recode printf.
You will then be allowed to reuse the function in your future projects.
You will mainly learn how to use variadic arguments.

name: get_next_line
rules: You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-02, 42cursus-push_swap, fract-ol, pipex, minitalk, and 42cursus-fdf. You must have validated 42cursus-libft. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: May it be a file, stdin, or even later a network connection, you will always need a way to read content line by line. It is time to start working on this function, which will be essential for your future projects.

name: Libft
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-get_next_line, 42cursus-ft_printf, and born2beroot
description: Ce premier projet en tant qu'étudiant de 42 va vous faire consolider vos acquis de piscine. Vous allez recoder un certain nombre de fonctions de la librairie C standard, ainsi que d'autres fonctions utilitaires que vous réutiliserez tout au long de votre cursus.

name: minishell
rules: You must have validated 1 of minirt, cub3d, 42cursus-fdf, , so_long, and 42cursus-fract-ol. You must have validated 1 of pipex and minitalk. You must have validated 42cursus-push_swap. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-04 and cpp-module-00
description: The objective of this project is for you to create a simple shell.

name: Philosophers
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-push_swap. You must have validated 1 of 42cursus-fdf, so_long, minirt, cub3d, and 42cursus-fract-ol. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: cpp-module-00 and exam-rank-04

name: netwhat
rules: You must have validated kfs-x. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description:
Netwhat will allow you to discover the network and to understand how it works. This will allow you to understand how some things you already 
use in your everyday life, without even knowing it.
For that you will answer a questionnaire on the website netwhat.42.fr.
If you unregister this project, you will need to wait three days before you can retry the subject.

name: cub3d
rules: You must have validated philosophers and 42cursus-minishell. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: minirt, webserv, ft_irc, and ft_containers. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: This project is inspired by the world-famous eponymous 90's game, which was the first FPS ever. It will enable you to explore ray-casting. Your goal will be to make a dynamic view inside a maze, in which you'll have to find your way.

name: miniRT
rules: You must have validated philosophers and 42cursus-minishell. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: cub3d, webserv, ft_irc, and ft_containers. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Ce projet est une introduction au monde incroyable du Raytracing.

name: libasm
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: The aim of this project is to get familiar with assembly language.

name: CPP Module 01
rules: You must have validated cpp-module-00. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers

name: CPP Module 02
rules: You must have validated cpp-module-01. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers
description: This module is all about polymorphism and operators.

name: CPP Module 03
rules: You must have validated cpp-module-02. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers
description: This module is about inheritance in C++

name: CPP Module 04
rules: You must have validated cpp-module-03. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers
description: Polymorphisme de sous-type, classe abstraite et interfaces

name: CPP Module 05
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated cpp-module-04. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers

name: CPP Module 06
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated cpp-module-05. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers

name: CPP Module 07
rules: You must have validated cpp-module-06. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers

name: CPP Module 08
rules: You must have validated cpp-module-07. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers

name: ft_irc
rules: You must have validated 1 of cub3d and minirt. You must have validated 1 of netwhat and netpractice. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated cpp-module-08. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_transcendence and webserv
description: Create your own IRC server in C++, fully compatible with an official client.

name: webserv
rules: You must have validated 1 of cub3d and minirt. You should have validated 1 of netwhat and netpractice. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_transcendence and ft_irc. You must have validated cpp-module-08
description:
This project is here to make you write your own HTTP server.
You will be able to test it with a real browser.
HTTP is one of the most used protocol on internet.
Knowing its arcane will be useful, even if you won't be working on a
website.

name: ft_containers
rules: You must have validated 1 of minirt and cub3d. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated cpp-module-08. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_transcendence. You should have validated 1 of netwhat and netpractice
description: Les nombreux containers du C++ ont de divers intérêts. Afin de bien les comprendre, nous allons les ré-implémenter !

name: ft_transcendence
rules: You must not have validated any of quests common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated ft_containers. You must have validated 1 of webserv and ft_irc. You must have validated 1 of inception and ft_services
description: Surprise

name: Exam Rank 02
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-ft_printf and 42cursus-get_next_line. You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert

name: Exam Rank 03
rules: You must have validated 1 of minitalk, pipex, and 42cursus-minishell. You must have validated exam-rank-02 and 42cursus-push_swap. You must have validated 1 of cub3d, minirt, fract-ol, 42cursus-fdf, and so_long. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert

name: Exam Rank 04
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-minishell, exam-rank-03, and 42cursus-philosophers

name: Exam Rank 05
rules: You must have validated 1 of minirt and cub3d. You should have validated 1 of netwhat and netpractice. You must have validated exam-rank-04 and cpp-module-08. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert

name: Exam Rank 06
rules: You must have validated ft_containers and exam-rank-05. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 1 of ft_irc and webserv

name: avaj-launcher
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: First projet of the Java projects arc. Implementation of a simple Java program according to a given class diagram written in UML.

name: camagru
rules: You must have validated any of quests: 42-to-42cursus-transfert and common-core
description: Ce premier projet vous remet dans le bain du web : vous allez devoir réaliser, un petit site Instagram-like permettant à des utilisateurs de réaliser et partager des photo-montages. Vous allez ainsi implémenter, à mains nues (les frameworks sont interdits), les fonctionnalités de base rencontrées sur la majorité des sites possédant une base utilisateur.

name: drivers-and-interrupts
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-little-penguin-1
description: Learn how to connect a driver to your kernel. We will use a keyboard driver for this project.

name: expert-system
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 1 of 42cursus-lem_in, 42cursus-rubik, and 42cursus-n-puzzle
description: Ce projet vous demande de créer, dans le langage de votre choix, un système expert en calcul des propositions, autrement dit un programme capable de raisonner sur un ensemble de règles et de faits initiaux afin de déduire certains autres faits.

name: fix-me
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-swingy
description: Final project of the Java Programming arc. Write a program that simulates stock exchanges and deals with trading algorithms, with networking and socket implementations.

name: ft_ality
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-ft_turing. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet va vous initier aux problématiques liées à l'analyse syntaxique automatique (dite parsing), en étudiant les automates finis avec un jeu de combat.

name: ft_linux
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Le premier projet de la branche Kernel ! Il s'agit d'un simple LFS, afin que vous construisiez votre propre distribution sur laquelle vous travaillerez ensuite pour les prochains projets.

name: ft_ssl_des
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_ssl_md5
description: You will recode part of the OpenSSL program, specifically BASE64, DES-ECB and DES-CBC.

name: ft_ssl_md5
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-ft_ping. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: You will recode part of the OpenSSL program, specifically the MD5 Hashing Algorithm.

name: ft_ssl_rsa
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-ft_ssl_des. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: You will code your own random prime number generator and use it to make private RSA keys.

name: ft_turing
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: ft_turing vous fera découvrir le modèle de Turing à la base du paradigme impératif à travers une implémentation de ce modèle en OCaml.

name: gbmu
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet a pour but de vous faire coder un émulateur de gameboy normal et color. Vous allez ainsi vous familiariser avec la documentation electronique, mieux appréhender l’émulation de hardware et comprendre le fonctionnement interne d’une gameboy ainsi que des roms

name: gomoku
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 1 of 42cursus-lem_in, 42cursus-rubik, and 42cursus-n-puzzle
description: Ce projet vous demande de créer, dans le langage de votre choix, un jeu de Gomoku intégrant un joueur IA capable de battre un joueur humain le plus rapidement possible. Pour ce faire, vous allez implémenter un algorithme min-max mais aussi (et surtout), faire des recherches et essais pour trouver les heuristiques les plus adaptées. Ce ne sera pas aussi facile qu'un jeu de dames.

name: guimp
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: L'objectif de ce projet sera pour vous de réaliser une librairie d'interface graphique. Vous devrez prouver son bon fonctionnement avec un petit logiciel d'édition d'image 2D. Cette librairie devra être la plus complète et modulable possible, l'objectif étant de la réutiliser dans vos futurs projets, que ce soit pour vos projets de la branche graphique ou vos autres projets du cursus.

name: humangl
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-scop
description: Ce projet intermédiaire d'OpenGL est une introduction à la modélisation hiérarchique. Vous allez apprendre à utiliser les matrices afin de lier différentes parties d’un modèle humanoïde et les animer.

name: kfs-1
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-little-penguin-1
description: Discover the world of "Kernel Programming" and learn how to create your very own Kernel from scratch.

name: kfs-2
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-1
description: Discover the world of Kernel Programming and learn how to create your very own Kernel from scratch.

name: kfs-3
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-2
description: Third Kernel from Scratch project. Learn how to manage the memory in you kernel.

name: kfs-4
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-3
description: Projet visant a créer une Interrupt Description Table et gerer les interruptions avec votre Kernel.

name: kfs-5
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-4. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: You must now develop process managing in your Kernel, by implementing how to interpret the command :(){ :|:& }

name: kfs-6
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-5
description: Keep on developping your own kernel. This project will help you set up your own filesystem.

name: kfs-7
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-6. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: This project will teach you how to build your own syscalls for your kernel, as well as user accounts, sockets, and a Unix-like hierarchy. Almost a full kernel here!

name: kfs-8
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-7
description: Build a module interface for your kernel.

name: kfs-9
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-8
description: Create an ELF parser and loader for your kernel.

name: kfs-x
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-kfs-9
description: This is the final kernel project. It just requires you to create a complete linux environment. Maybe name your kernel aswell?

name: matcha
rules: You must have validated any of quests: 42-to-42cursus-transfert and common-core
description: Ce second projet vous introduit à un outil plus évolué pour réaliser vos applications web : le micro-framework. Nous vous invitons à réaliser, dans le langage de votre choix, un site de rencontres. Les interactions entre utilisateurs seront au coeur du projet !

name: multilayer-perceptron
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-dslr
description: Sujet proposé par l'association 42AI.  Ce projet est une introduction aux réseaux de neurones artificiels grâce à l'implémentation d'un multilayer perceptron.

name: n-puzzle
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Il s'agit ici de réaliser, dans le langage de votre choix, un programme capable de résoudre des Taquins de tailles variées, de façon aussi optimale que possible.

name: process-and-memory
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-little-penguin-1
description: An introduction to syscalls and memory management within linux kernel

name: shaderpixel
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-humangl. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Maintenant que vous êtes à l'aise avec les objets 3D et les techniques basiques de rendu, on va parler sérieux et travailler réellement dans l'espace de la carte graphique. A vous de composer et créer les objets les plus déments grâce à la programmation de shaders.

name: strace
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-lem-ipc
description: Premier pas d'une série de projets en C menant à la réalisation d'un mini-GDB, ce projet vous demande de recoder strace, un outil qui permet de lister tous les appels systèmes effectués par un programme en cours d'exécution.

name: swifty-companion
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet a pour but de vous initier au développement d'application mobile. Il s'agit de réaliser, une application qui permet de récupérer les informations des élèves de 42, en utilisant l’API de l'intranet de 42.

name: swifty-proteins
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-swifty-companion
description: Ce projet a pour but de vous initier a la 3D and une application mobile classique. Vous devrez principalement réaliser une application qui modélisera des ligands en 3D, cette application sera aussi l'occasion d'approfondir vos connaissances dans le framework mobile de votre choix.

name: swingy
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-avaj-launcher. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: This is the second project from the Java world at 42. You will learn to develop GUI applications with the SWING framework, in order to create an RPG game.

name: taskmaster
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Il s'agit de réaliser un programme de job control, dans le langage de votre choix. Ce qu'on vous demandera d'accomplir est très proche du programme supervisor

name: boot2root
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-snow-crash. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Challenge Securité : Cherchez en groupe les différents moyens de passer root sur l'ISO fournie en ressources.

name: cloud-1
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet est une introduction aux serveurs en cloud.

name: computorv1
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Le but de ce projet est de vous faire (re)prendre contact avec la manipulation d’outils mathématiques élémentaires, qui pourront vous être utiles dans de nombreux autres sujets de 42. Il ne s’agit pas de faire des maths pour faire des maths, mais bien de vous permettre d’aborder plus progressivement et sereinement les sujets où il y en a besoin. Vous êtes libres dans le choix de langage pour réaliser le sujet.

name: death
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-war. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Dernier et ultime projet virus. Realiser a partir de Famine, Pestilence et War un veritable code metamorphique.

name: dslr
rules: You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Sujet proposé par l'association 42AI.  Découvrez la Data Science à travers ce projet dans la reconstitution du Choixpeau Magique de Poudlard ! Attention, ceci n'est pas un sujet sur les appareils photos.

name: durex
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-woody-woodpacker. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Utilisez vos skills sur la création de daemon pour créer votre premier trojan basique.

name: ft_hangouts
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet a pour but de vous initier au développement d'application Android. Il s'agit de réaliser, en JAVA, une application mobile de gestion de contacts sur la plateforme Android de Google.  Le but ici est de comprendre comment fonctionne une application Android, comment Android gère votre application et comment utiliser le SDK.

name: ft_linear_regression
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet vous servira a faire vos premiers pas dans l'IA et plus precisement le machine learning. Vous allez commencer par algo simple. Vous coderez un program qui peut predire le prix d une voiture en utilisant la regression lineaire avec un algorithme du gradient

name: ft_nmap
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_traceroute
description: Recoder le programme nmap va être pour vous l'occasion d'approfondir vos connaissances dans le reseau (TCP/IP) et ainsi comprendre aussi via une utilisation avancee les threads dans un usage reel.

name: ft_ping
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Recoder la commande ping va vous permettre d'avoir une première approche dans la communication (TCP/IP) entre deux machines dans un réseau.

name: ft_traceroute
rules: You must have validated 1 of ft_ping and 42cursus-ft_ping. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Recoder la commande traceroute va être pour vous l'occasion d'approfondir vos connaissances dans le reseau (TCP/IP) en faisant le suivit des chemins qu'un paquet IP va emprunter entre deux machines.

name: ft_vox
rules: You must have validated 1 of scop and 42cursus-scop. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: ft_vox est un projet d'introduction au moteur de voxel, inspiré de minecraft, dans lequel vous devez créer un monde généré aléatoirement.

name: in-the-shadows
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet a pour but de vous faire développer un jeu complet nécessitant un peu d'algo et beaucoup de créativité.

name: krpsim
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 1 of 42cursus-lem_in, 42cursus-n-puzzle, and 42cursus-rubik
description: Ce projet d'algorithmie consiste à réaliser un programme qui va optimiser le rendement d’un graphe de processus, avec des contraintes de ressources. A vous d'explorer les algorithmes existants possibles et de choisir, voire de créer, ce qui vous semble le plus adapté. Vous êtes libres dans le choix de langage pour réaliser le sujet.

name: override
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-rainfall. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Si Rainfall vous a paru facile, voila de quoi vous donner du fil a retordre. Override est la dernière ISO de challenge qui vous demandera de partir à la recherche de failles présents dans des binaires protégés, et reconstruire ces binaires en fonction de leur comportement.

name: pestilence
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-famine
description: Deuxième projet virus. Réutilisez Famine et permettez-lui de se cacher.

name: rubik
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Projet d'algorithmie non-trivial, ce projet a pour but de vous faire réaliser un résolveur de Rubik's Cube. Vous êtes libres dans le choix de langage pour réaliser le sujet.

name: scop
rules: You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Your first steps in the world of 3D on GPU with OpenGL. You will become acquainted with the main concepts during this small game project.

name: snow-crash
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Projet introductif à la sécurité en informatique, Snow Crash a pour but de faire découvrir la sécurité dans différents sous-domaines, avec une approche orientée développeur. Vous allez vous familiariser avec plusieurs langages (ASM/perl/php..), développer une certaine logique pour comprendre des programmes inconnus, et ainsi prendre conscience des problèmes liés à de simples erreurs de programmation .

name: war
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-pestilence
description: Troisième projet virus. Reprenez Pestilence, et faites en sorte que votre binaire modifie sa signature au runtime.

name: xv
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-in-the-shadows. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet vous est proposé par l'entreprise Daher et a pour but de vous faire développer une interface graphique sous Unity à des fin d'optimisation de processus industriels.

name: hypertube
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-matcha. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Dernier projet de sa série, le projet Hypertube vous invite à découvrir une catégorie d'outil extrêmement puissante : les frameworks MVC. Vous apprendrez à manipuler un MVC, dans le langage de votre choix, pour réaliser un site de streaming de video téléchargées via le protocole BitTorrent.

name: little-penguin-1
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_linux
description: Le début d'une série de challenges inspirés du challenge Eudyptula, vous permettant d'aborder de nombreux points du developpement Kernel.

name: rainfall
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-snow-crash
description: Rainfall est un iso de challenge légèrement plus complexe que Snow Crash qui vous plongera dans les méandres du reverse engineering et vous apprendra à reconstruire un code et à en comprendre son fonctionnement afin d'en dénicher les failles. Pourrez-vous atteindre le dernier level ?

name: dr-quine
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce petit projet d'algo vous permet d'aborder les problématiques de l'auto-réplication, et vous confronte au théorème de récursion de Kleene !

name: woody-woodpacker
rules: You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Projet dans la suite logique de nm/otools qui a pour principe de modifier les headers d'un fichier de type ELF64. Le but ici est de pouvoir ajouter un morceau de code et obfusquer une partie d'un fichier non strippé.

name: matt-daemon
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-taskmaster. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Projet Unix dont le but est de créer un daemon de type serveur. Ce serveur va alors écouter sur un port donné et interpréter une liste de commandes.

name: filesystem
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-process-and-memory and 42cursus-drivers-and-interrupts. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Create your own filesystem, for your linux kernel.

name: music-room
rules: You must have validated any of quests: 42-to-42cursus-transfert and common-core
description: Projet en partenariat avec Deezer. Créez en groupe une application mobile complète de playlist collaborative en utilisant les SDK et API de Deezer. Au programme : du développement natif mobile, du développement de back-end et de la création d'API REST.

name: red-tetris
rules: You must have validated any of quests: 42-to-42cursus-transfert and common-core
description: L’objectif de ce projet est de développer un jeu de tetris multijoueurs en réseau à partir d’une pile logicielle exclusivement Full Stack Javascript

name: h42n42
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Projet d'introduction au Framework OCSIGEN, permettant de créer des applications web riches en OCaml. Concevez un simulateur de Bestioles échappant à un dangereux virus !

name: famine
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-woody-woodpacker
description: Bienvenue dans le monde merveilleux des virus, trojans et autres hantises de <Insert random antiVirus software>... Votre but ici est de mettre vos compétences sur la manipulation des fichiers binaires et faire votre premier virus. ATTENTION : Ce projet est uniquement à but pédagogique.

name: computorv2
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-computorv1
description: Maintenant que vous avez programmé votre résolveur d'équations, il est temps d'aller un peu plus loin. Computor V2 vous propose de créer votre propre calculette en ligne de commande, qui va intégrer votre computorv1 ainsi que des fonctions de calculs matriciels, de resolution de fonctions, de calculs sur nombre imaginaires etc...

name: userspace_digressions
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-little-penguin-1
description: Make your own userspace init binary.

name: total-perspective-vortex
rules: You must have validated 1 of 42cursus-dslr and dslr
description: Apprenez à utiliser les outils python pour traiter des données en grandes dimensions, et créez une interface homme machine grâce aux ondes cérébrales.

name: mod1
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet graphique de simulation vous fera représenter une surface en 3D, sur laquelle s'écoule de l'eau. Empirique, ou scientifique (avec nombre équations), recréez une vague, un tsunami, ou simplement de la pluie sur votre surface.

name: zappy
rules: You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Vous allez ici réaliser un jeu multi-joueurs en réseau TCP/IP. Ce jeu sera constitué d’un serveur gérant le terrain de jeu, d’un client graphique qui affiche l'état du plateau, et de clients IA qui se connectent sur le serveur pour piloter un joueur sur le terrain. C'est un projet très complet qui vous donne l'occasion d'exprimer votre créativité en plus de vos connaissances techniques !

name: lem-ipc
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-malloc. You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Vous avez vu précédemment la communication entre processus sur le réseau, via TCP/IP

name: nm-otool
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Décortiquez le format des exécutables MacOS et comprenez comment le kernel lance les binaires, en ré-écrivant ces deux outils du système. Indispensable pour tous ceux qui voudront faire de la sécurité, ce projet est plus généralement une ouverture sur la culture UNIX système.

name: malloc
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Que se cache derriere malloc ? Vous l'utilisez depuis la piscine C, mais ce n'est pas un appel système. Découvrez les rouages d'une gestion optimum de la mémoire, et recodez-le, ainsi que free et realloc.

name: 42run
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-scop
description: Vous connaissez Temple Run ? Il est temps de le refaire ! Ce projet intermédiaire d'OpenGL vous invite à recréer ce jeu mobile. Amusez-vous : tous les bonus sont possible pour dépasser la célèbre franchise.

name: lem_in
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Votre colonie de fourmis doit se déplacer d'un point à un autre. Mais comment faire pour que cela prenne le moins de temps possible ? Ce projet vous fait découvrir les algorithmes de parcours de graphe : votre programme devra sélectionner intelligemment les chemins et les mouvements précis qui doivent être empruntés par ces fourmis.

name: corewar
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet vous invite à créer une arène virtuelle et à y faire s’affronter des programmes codés dans un langage simpliste. Vous allez ainsi aborder la conception d’une VM (avec les instructions qu’elle reconnait, les registres, etc), et les problématiques de compilation d’un langage assembleur en bytecode. Avec, en bonus, le plaisir de faire s’affronter vos champions sur votre arène !

name: fract-ol
rules: You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-minishell, exam-rank-03, fdf, 42cursus-fdf, so_long, minirt, cub3d, and philosophers. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_printf and 42cursus-get_next_line. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Discover 2D programming and the psychedelic universe of fractals in this project, using minilibX.

name: ft_ls
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Pour tout connaitre du filesystem, de la façon dont sont rangés les fichiers et répertoires, codez par vous-même une des commandes les plus utilisées : ls .

name: nibbler
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-lem-ipc. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce projet de C++ vous fait recoder le jeu Snake avec plusieurs interfaces graphiques différentes

name: bomberman
rules: You must have validated 42cursus-humangl. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Bomberman, c'est un classique du jeu video : aussi simple dans son gameplay que fun à jouer ! Vous allez ici profiter de sa simplicité pour faire votre premier gros projet de C++ de facture professionnelle. Vous allez recoder une version de Bomberman, en C++ et avec OpenGL, avec pour objectif de réaliser un jeu le plus abouti possible.

name: darkly
rules: You must have validated any of quests: web-framework-validated and common-core
description: Projet introductif à la sécurité en informatique dans le domaine spécifique du web, ce projet va vous faire disséquer un site web vulnérable. Ce faisant, vous allez développer votre propre façon de penser sécurité dans une application web et prendre conscience des problèmes liés à de simples erreurs de développement, autant d'un point de vue programmation que d'un point de vue conception.

name: Piscine PHP Symfony
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-piscine-ruby-on-rails and 42cursus-piscine-python-django
description: Piscines are an important time in your cursus, during which you will have the occasion to learn a new language, or even a new paradigm!

name: Piscine Ruby on Rails
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-piscine-php-symfony and 42cursus-piscine-python-django
description: Piscines are an important time in your cursus, during which you will have the occasion to learn a new language, or even a new paradigm!

name: Piscine Python Django
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-piscine-ruby-on-rails and 42cursus-piscine-php-symfony
description: Piscines are an important time in your cursus, during which you will have the occasion to learn a new language, or even a new paradigm!

name: Piscine OCaml
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Piscines are an important time in your cursus, during which you will have the occasion to learn a new language, or even a new paradigm!

name: Piscine Unity
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Piscines are an important time in your cursus, during which you will have the occasion to learn a new language, or even a new paradigm!

name: Piscine Swift iOS
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Piscines are an important time in your cursus, during which you will have the occasion to learn a new language, or even a new paradigm!

name: CPP Module 00
rules: You must have validated 1 of philosophers and 42cursus-philosophers. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-05, ft_irc, webserv, and ft_containers. You must have validated 42cursus-minishell. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description:
This first module of C++ is designed to help you understand the specifities of the language when compared to C.
Time to dive into Object Oriented Programming!

name: particle-system
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 42cursus-humangl
description: Ce projet d’infographie est une introduction au monde merveilleux du GPU. Via l’utilisation d’OpenGL et d’OpenCL, permettant une parallélisation massive des calculs, vous devrez créer un système de particules tout en respectant les contraintes de performance imposées.

name: Internship I
rules: You must have validated 1 of exam-rank-06 and c-exam-alone-in-the-dark-beginner. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-startup-internship and internship-ii. You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: Ce premier pas en entreprise est un passage important de votre cursus 42. Ce stage est le moment où vous allez découvrir le monde de l'entreprise et mettre en oeuvre vos capacités de travail, d'adaptation, au service du marché. C'est un premier élément pour votre CV, et l'occasion de voir émerger votre futur domaine de prédilection.

name: Internship II
rules: You must have validated 1 of first-internship and internship-i. You must be at least level 14 in cursus 42cursus. You must not have validated more than 3 of internship-i, internship-ii, part_time-i, part_time-ii, and 42cursus-startup-internship
description: Votre cursus 42 devrait se terminer sur une dernière période d'insertion professionnelle : le second stage. Ce stage est l'accomplissement de votre parcours, il vous permettra d'aller démontrer votre expertise en entreprise, et vous servira de tremplin pour lancer votre carrière.

name: Part_Time I
rules: You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 1 of exam-rank-06 and c-exam-alone-in-the-dark-beginner
description: Ce premier pas en entreprise est un passage important de votre cursus 42. Ce stage est le moment où vous allez découvrir le monde de l'entreprise et mettre en oeuvre vos capacités de travail, d'adaptation, au service du marché. C'est un premier élément pour votre CV, et l'occasion de voir émerger votre futur domaine de prédilection.

name: Part_Time II
rules: You must be at least level 14 in cursus 42cursus. You must not have validated more than 3 of internship-i, internship-ii, part_time-i, part_time-ii, and 42cursus-startup-internship
description: Ce premier pas en entreprise est un passage important de votre cursus 42. Ce stage est le moment où vous allez découvrir le monde de l'entreprise et mettre en oeuvre vos capacités de travail, d'adaptation, au service du marché. C'est un premier élément pour votre CV, et l'occasion de voir émerger votre futur domaine de prédilection.

name: Open Project
rules: You must have validated any of quests: common-core and 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: Ce projet est l'occasion d'aborder la gestion de projet sur le long terme, autour d'un sujet qui vous tient à coeur.  Vous êtes entièrement libres dans le choix du sujet - ça peut être en lien avec l'informatique, ou être entièrement autre chose !  Vos seules contraintes sont 1) de travailler en groupe avec d'autres étudiants de 42, 2) de réaliser votre projet sur une période de 5 mois.

name: Piscine Python Data Science
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: The piscine focuses on basic programming skills with Python and the most popular and useful data science libraries. The participants will be able to collect data with parsing, preprocess data using Pandas and SQL and build pipelines with machine learning algorithms.

name: Piscine Java
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core
description: The Java piscine is developed in order to overcome the barrier to entry to the professional field. All days of the piscine are focused on learning and understanding the Java infrastructure and basic technologies which are used in enterprise development. Acquired knowledge will help you to understand the main language mechanics and develop the software conforming to the generally accepted standards.

name: Startup Internship
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must have validated 1 of exam-rank-06 and c-exam-alone-in-the-dark-beginner. You must not have validated more than 3 of internship-i, internship-ii, part_time-i, part_time-ii, and startup-internship

name: tweets
rules: You must have validated piscine-python-data-science
description: This project is an introduction to natural language processing: bag of words, TFIDF, stemming, lemmatization, stop-words, cosine similarity, n-grams, word2vec

name: churn
rules: You must have validated tweets
description: This project is an introduction to artificial neural nets: fully-connected neural nets, hidden layers, activation functions, back-propagation, dropout

name: mySpotify
rules: You must have validated churn
description: This project is an introduction to algorithms used for recommendations: non-personalized, content-based, collaborative filtering.

name: FWA
rules: You must have validated piscine-java
description: Summary: now you will develop your first web application using standard Java technologies

name: Cinema
rules: You must have validated fwa
description: Let’s expand your knowledge of web development using the Spring stack and master Hibernate framework

name: SpringBoot
rules: You must have validated cinema
description: Let's make a final MVP for our application using the most current Java-based Spring Boot development technology

name: Restful
rules: You must have validated springboot
description: the tasks in this project will teach you how to use Spring mechanisms to develop REST applications

name: MicroServices
rules: You must have validated restful
description: now you will master the skills of creating microservice applications using Spring framework

name: 42sh
rules: You must have finished quest(s) common-core. You must not have validated 42sh
description: Ce projet consiste à créer de toutes pièces un shell complet, en reprenant le travail effectué sur votre 21sh. Un jeu minimum de fonctionnalités vous sont demandées, à partir duquel vous allez constuire votre propre shell abouti - en allant potentiellement jusqu'au job control et au shell script. Ce projet vous permet donc de voir ou revoir une très large palette des fonctionnalités UNIX (et POSIX) standard.

name: rt
rules: You must not have validated rt. You must have validated any of quests: 42-to-42cursus-transfert and common-core
description: Passez à la vitesse supérieure ! Suite du Rtv1, le RT pousse beaucoup plus loin les possibilités du Raytracing : effet miroir, transparence, découpe des objets, applications de textures... Capitalisez sur le projet précédent pour réaliser une infrastructure capable de supporter toutes ces ramifications et obtenir de sublimes images de synthèse.

name: push_swap
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-minishell and exam-rank-03. You must not have validated push_swap. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_printf and 42cursus-get_next_line. You must have validated 1 of born2beroot and netwhat
description: Ce projet vous demande de trier des données sur une pile, avec un set d’instructions limité, en moins de coups possibles. Pour le réussir, vous devrez manipuler différents algorithmes de tri et choisir la (ou les ?) solution la plus appropriée pour un classement optimisé des données.

name: Uber
rules: You must have validated understanding-customer
description: This project is an introduction to time series analysis: stationarity, exponential smoothing, SARIMA

name: Understanding customer
rules: You must have validated myspotify
description: This project is an introduction to deep learning and NLP: recurrent neural nets (RNN), LSTM, Transformer, BERT

name: City Life
rules: You must have validated churn
description: This project is an introduction to geospatial analytics: GeoPandas, clustering, making maps

name: MessageQueue
rules: You must have validated microservices

name: Amazon
rules: You must have validated city-life
description: This project is an introduction to Apache Spark (Python API) and network and graph analysis

name: Fried eggs
rules: You must have validated amazon
description: This project is an introduction to Deep Learning and computer vision (CNN, instance segmentation, object detection, data labeling)

name: ft_newton
rules: You must have validated 1 of humangl and 42cursus-humangl
description: basic Physics engine - motion - gravity - collisions

name: Inception
rules: You must have validated 1 of cub3d and minirt. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated cpp-module-08 and netpractice. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_transcendence
description:
Ce projet a pour but d'approfondir vos connaissances en vous faisant utiliser Docker.
 Vous allez virtualiser plusieurs images Docker en les créant dans votre nouvelle machine virtuelle personnelle.

name: Born2beroot
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-libft. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-02, 42cursus-push_swap, fract-ol, pipex, minitalk, and 42cursus-fdf
description: This project aims to introduce you to the wonderful world of virtualization.

name: minitalk
rules: You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot. You must have validated 42cursus-get_next_line and 42cursus-ft_printf. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-03, inception, ft_services, pipex, 42cursus-minishell, and philosophers. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: The purpose of this project is to code a small data exchange program using UNIX signals. It is an introductory project for the bigger UNIX projects that will appear later on in the cursus.

name: pipex
rules: You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-03, 42cursus-minishell, minitalk, and philosophers. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_printf and 42cursus-get_next_line
description: This project aims to make you understand a bit deeper two concets that you already know: the redirections and the pipes. It is an introductory project for the bigger UNIX projects that will appear later on in the cursus.

name: FdF
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: 42cursus-minishell, exam-rank-03, fdf, 42cursus-fract-ol, so_long, minirt, cub3d, and philosophers. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_printf and 42cursus-get_next_line. You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot
description: All programs that you wrote until now were executed in text mode on your terminal. Now, let’s discover something more exciting: how to open a graphics window and draw inside? To start your journey in graphic programming, FdF offers to represent “iron wire” meshing in 3D.

name: so_long
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-get_next_line and 42cursus-ft_printf. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-03, 42cursus-fdf, 42cursus-fract-ol, 42cursus-minishell, minirt, cub3d, and philosophers. You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot
description: This project is a small 2D game with minilibx. You'll learn about textures, sprites and tiles.

name: NetPractice
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-minishell and philosophers. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_irc, webserv, ft_containers, netwhat, exam-rank-05, inception, and ft_services
description: NetPractice is a general practical exercise to let you discover networking.
